name: Taskcity
overview:
www.taskcity.com is a platform for project outsourcing and management services. Whether you are looking for professionals to work with without having to pay a hefty fee or you just have ideas that you would like to bounce off of someone. Taskcity’s experts’ help is available regardless of the phase of your project.

Comparing to other popular outsourcing or freelancer online platforms, Taskcity also provide unique offline services:

  • Free consultation from a Taskcity expert to analyze your requirement and turn it into project.
  • Free project management service from a Taskcity expert to help ensure project quality.

  • A variety of free online project management tools that help you track and analyze project.

                                              TaskPal Introduction

Taskpal is a human service provided by taskcity, it enables individuals and businesses to simply, securely and efficiently outsource assistant service online and offline, solving the issue of international outsourcing.

Taskpal is consisting of many specialists with rich experience in international outsourcing project development. They are responsible to manage every step from project posting to the delivery and acceptance, protecting the smooth progress and satisfactory delivery of the project.

offices.address1: San Jose, CA 95131, USA 1903 Concourse Dr.
